message.body: Hey ####! I'm in ########### for a few hours. Thought I'd see if we could meet up for lunch? I'm dying for some lime and basil:)
Sorry, I'm on my way to ######### with ###### and his parents! Otherwise, I would totally meet you there--perfect day for pho! Let's try and get together next week though.
Okk definitely! Have a great time in ######### :)
Hey sorry to bother u on ur trip. I just had a quick question. Did you ever apply to a temp agency while you were looking for jobs?
No, I don't think I did.
